lines.text: Yeah, the Black Shakes. What causes it?
What causes it?
[points to various pieces of equipment throughout the room]

This causes it! This causes it! This causes it! Information overload! All the electronics around you poisoning the airwaves. Technological fucking civilization. But we still have all this shit, because we can't live without it. Let me do my work.

What the fuck is going on? WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON? You know, all my life, I've been careful to stay in my own corner. Looking out for Number One... no complications. Now, suddenly, I'm responsible for the *entire fucking world*, and everybody and his mother is trying to kill me, IF... IF... my head doesn't blow up first.
Maybe it's not just about you any more.

Listen. You listen to me. You see that city over there? THAT'S where I'm supposed to be. Not down here with the dogs, and the garbage, and the fucking last month's newspapers blowing *back* and *forth*. I've had it with them, I've had it with you, I've had it with ALL THIS - *I want ROOM SERVICE*! I want the club sandwich, I want the cold Mexican beer, I want a $10,000-a-night hooker! I want my shirts laundered... like they do... at the Imperial Hotel... in Tokyo.
[Johnny and Jane have just broken into the computer warehouse]

[swipes a pile of circuit boards and components off the desk and says to no one in particular]
I need a Sino-logic 16.
[runs around the computer warehouse finding everything he calls for]
Sogo 7 Data Gloves, a GPL stealth module, one Burdine intelligent translator... Thompson iPhone.
If I fall, you don't get the head, right? If you lose the head, you're fucked!
I can carry nearly eighty gigs of data in my head.
Come to Jesus!
[gets back on his feet after being struck by Spider's van]
[mumbles]
Jesus.
Jesus time.

[Johnny successfully picks a lock to a door of an electronic store]
Where did you learn to do that?
Had a summer job breaking and entering.
If you're not expected then you're not invited - SO FUCK OFF!
Who's Jones?
He's that guy... who fucks your mother!
If I wanted the silicon dug out of my back brain I would have gone to Mexico City! I want a full restoration; I want it all back!
[after being told about the state of their late CEO]
[In Japanese]
Ghost in the machine.
Man owes me fifty thou' and he's scamming my phone card.
And it's still our first date.
No dice?
No. But I can get it out
How?
A general anesthetic, a cranial drill and a pair of forceps.
I could die, right?
It's gonna kill you anyway.If I take it out, you'll probably survive but lose some fine motor skills.You might not remember anything for more than three minutes.

[Hooky's in the bar mopping up after a long night when the Preacher enters, quoting the Bible]
They err in vision, they stumble in judgment, for all the tables are full of vomit and filthiness, so that there is no place clean.

[Hooky considers this then grins]
You should have seen it before.
You can't shoot me.
Not in the head.
They'll negotiate; they're corporate.
So's the Yakuza.

Heaven]
Where's Spider?
He's dead.
[looks over at the twisted and burning hulk that was once Spider's van]

[shakes head]
No, not there. Earlier.
[Street Preacher submerges his prosthetic hand into liquid nitrogen and then smashes it]
[looking at what is left of his shattered hand]

[groaning]
Why did you do that?
Get on the table.
Why?
Don't be a bigger asshole than you have to, get on the table.
Double cheese, anchovies?
It's Jesus time!
"Johnny Boy", my ass. What's the fuckin' score here?
HALT SINNERS!
Pick it up, Ralfi... How bout it, Ralfi? You said you've locked down a date for the procedure.
And hello to you too.

[dressing]
Where's home, Johnny?
Home?
[ponders the question a moment longer]
Home? Would you believe I don't even know?

[dons her coat]
Yes, I would.
Going out?
Just getting some ice.

[as she is leaving the room, Johnny looks over to the ice that is still cold in the bucket]
We've got...
[looks at the closing door]
ice.
Takahashi! Do you know what this man is carrying in his head? He's carrying the cure to NAS.
I want to get online... I need a computer!
Who the fuck are you anyway?
Johnny.
Johnny who?
Just... Johnny?
Hit me.
I want room service!
[Jane looks on as Johnny's hands dance in the air]
What are you doing?
Making a long distance phone call. Beijing. A hotel.
[last lines]
Just GARBAGE. Get that out of here.
